com.continuuity.weave.api
Interface WeaveRunnerService

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, WeaveRunner
All Known Implementing Classes:
YarnWeaveRunnerService
public interface WeaveRunnerService
extends WeaveRunner, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

A WeaveRunner that extends Service to provide lifecycle management functions. The Service.start() method needs to be called before calling any other method of this interface. When done with this service, call Service.stop() to release any resources that it holds.
